titleStmt.title: Poems. By Robert Gomersall
titleStmt.author: Gomersall, Robert, 1602-1646?
Cecil, Thomas, fl. 1630, engraver.
Gomersall, Robert, 1602-1646? Tragedie of Lodovick Sforza Duke of Millan.
Gomersall, Robert, 1602-1646? Levites revenge.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by M[iles] F[lesher] for Iohn Marriot,

notesStmt.note: "The tragedie of Lodovick Sforza Duke of Millan. .. The second edition" and "The Levites revenge .. The second edition" each have separate dated title page and pagination; register is continuous. These two works also have engraved title pages (included in pagination above), each signed "Tho: Cecill sculp."; the first reads "Sforza by Rob: Gomersall". The works were originally published separately in 1627 and 1628.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
